email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We have a spot enquiry for 85,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. The vessel we're considering is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 180,000, LOA 300m. The initial freight quote is USD 22.50 per metric tonne. Laycan is flexible between December 10-15.

Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you review and possibly adjust it? Also, could you provide the vessel's certificates and the last three B/Ls for review?

Best,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

I understand your concern. After reviewing, we can offer a revised rate of USD 21.75 per metric tonne. I'll also send over the vessel's certificates and the last three B/Ls shortly.

Let me know if this revised rate works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thanks for the revised rate. We can proceed with USD 21.75 per metric tonne. Please confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage rate as well.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Great to hear! The laycan remains December 10-15. The demurrage rate is USD 18,000 per day. I'll send over the final booking confirmation shortly.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Confirmed. Please proceed with the booking as discussed. Looking forward to the final confirmation.

Best,
Sophia
